content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Scan for spyware and grayware When spyware and grayware protection is enabled, the spyware scan engine quarantines suspicious files when they are detected. To identify a file that the spyware scan engine should ignore, see Create Anti-Malware exceptions. Procedure Open the properties of the malware scan configuration. On the General tab, select Enable spyware/grayware protection. Click OK. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
